name: Azure OpenAI GPT
description: AI chat with Azure OpenAI's LLM

preferences.name: API Endpoint
preferences.description: The endpoint of the API (e.g. https://foo.openai.azure.com)

preferences.name: API Key
preferences.description: The API key of the Azure OpenAI service

preferences.name: API Version
preferences.description: The API version of the Azure OpenAI service (e.g. 2023-05-15)

preferences.name: Model Name
preferences.description: The deployment name of the model (e.g. gpt-35-turbo)

preferences.name: Line Length
preferences.description: The maximum number of characters per line to show in  Ulauncher

preferences.name: System Prompt
preferences.description: The prompt to start the conversation

preferences.name: Temperature
preferences.description: The randomness of the genereated output (consistent:0.0 -- random:2.0)

preferences.name: Max Tokens
preferences.description: The maximum number of tokens allowed for the generated answer

preferences.name: Frequency Penalty
preferences.description: The likelihood to avoid repeating the same word (verbose:-2.0 -- lean:2.0)

preferences.name: Presence Penalty
preferences.description: The likelihood to avoid repeating the same topic (verbose:-2.0 -- lean:2.0)
